effect: When this Pokémon is hit by a contact move, the attacker's Ability changes to Lingering Aroma.
synergies: Moves that force contact (e.g., U-turn, Body Press)
Teams that disrupt opponent's Ability-reliant strategies
Entry hazards to punish switches after Ability change
notes: Introduced in Generation IX. Can neutralize powerful Abilities like Intimidate or Speed Boost, but also risks giving opponents beneficial effects like Levitate. Best used on bulky Pokémon that can survive multiple hits.
